title: Arsenal Extends Premier League Lead with 3-1 Victory Over Chelsea
summary: Arsenal moved five points clear at the top of the Premier League after a dominant display against Chelsea at the Emirates. Goals from Saka, Havertz, and Rice sealed an impressive win.

title: Champions League Quarter-Final Draw: Barcelona vs Bayern Munich
summary: The Champions League quarter-final draw has produced several blockbuster ties, with Barcelona facing Bayern Munich and Real Madrid drawn against Manchester City in a repeat of recent classic encounters.

title: Lionel Messi Scores 900th Career Goal in Inter Miami Win
summary: Lionel Messi reached the remarkable milestone of 900 career goals with a trademark free-kick for Inter Miami. The 38-year-old continues to defy age with 15 goals already this MLS season.
